duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage customer contracts, ensuring accurate and timely invoices in the order processing system to the required service levels
Assess the importance of customer needs, and build rapport with them whether internal or external
Liaise with sales and operations as needed to expedite transactions and documentation
Closely monitor average days to Invoice, Contracts Not Invoiced, On-hold billing numbers
Provide back-up support to other members of the team as needed so that team service levels are maintained
Help Accounts Receivable (AR) in resolving queries and expedite payments from customers as requested
Address and/or escalate customer complaints or issues as required
Participate in continuous improvement initiatives as required

education_certification.credential: University Degree / Specialized Diploma / Vocational Training
